attributes.title: Absolutely not❤️
attributes.review: Hi my name is Abor Shawn I am 69 years old. This app is completely disgusting! When I opened I was greeted with a hideous picture of and orange , misogynistic, xenophobic, homophobic, child predator! Completely UNACCEPTABLE!!!! I was in so much shock I almost went into Cardiac arrest! This app needs to be deleted immediately! It is poison to the eyes!

attributes.title: You want this racist Cheeto to be are president 💀
attributes.review: I installed the app and it was so bad I got glitches and had to look at that ugly naked cheeto . It was like I heard voices in my head I heard them saying “trump 2020 🧚🏽‍♀️💕✨” I was so scared but not as scared as bunker boy he CAN NOT be are president again GEN Z will stop him know he’s tryna van tiktok Hell no. WE ARE TOO POWERFUL

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: I will never be downloading this app again. I was trying to see when the next rally was but instead it glitched and I was stuck on a Cheeto looking man’s picture for about 5 minutes. Horrible app.

attributes.title: Just awful 👁‍🗨👄👁‍🗨
attributes.review: Wow. I am so disappointed in this app. I downloaded it in order to hear important news from our AMAZING president. It turns out he is a racist homophobe who rapes children. WHO KNEW?? Would not recommend. It would be a shame if the App Store took down this app. 🤷‍♀️

attributes.title: mean🤬, racist💩, and dangerous😿
attributes.review: when I first opened the app, it made my sign up right away and wanted me to give them very inappropriate, and unnecessary information about me. Then after I signed up, it started to personally text and spam me mean, racist, and disturbing insults. DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP.

attributes.title: absolutely putrid
attributes.review: as soon as i opened the app there was very bright flashing lights and extremely loud noises. this sent my epilepsy into a spiral and  caused me to have a stroke and die. every time i opened the app my dog would projectile vomit, every. single. time. they also stole all of my credit card information and sent it to russian spies, now my family is being hunted by the russian mafia. thanks trump you’ve just killed me and my family. would not recommend downloading this app.

attributes.title: Do Not Recommend
attributes.review: Got this app to support the great Cheeto. Instead this app gave not only myself but my close friends massive diarrhea and one of them actually died. Terrible. Get this app out of the app store. Big cheeto man is a terrible president that only cares about himself and his money. 🤚🏽 goodbye

attributes.title: Highly disappointed
attributes.review: I opened the app hoping to keep up with Trumps 2020 campaign but came to find that it was just a place where Cheetos prompted themselves. If I can’t even use the official Trump app to see what he’s up to what else am I supposed to use??

attributes.title: awful, facist symbols!
attributes.review: upon installing this app i got a malware on my phone AND tablet, i dont know if only happened to me but there was nazi symbols and some odd chanting! if it happened to other people than this app needs to get taken down immediately!

attributes.title: Trash
attributes.review: I generally don’t write a review because I like to give apps the benefit of the doubt, but this is unacceptable. First off, all this app does is show images of a Cheeto. Then the app just started to glitch and turned my screen black. 0/10
